itemDescription: American music hall entertainer in the UK

wikipedia_page.main: Amy Height (c. 1866 – 21 March 1913) was an American music hall entertainer in the UK. She was an unusual black actor and comedian who introduced herself to British audiences first in pantomime and also in straight theatre.

response: * Amy Height (c. 1866–1913), African-American music hall entertainer in the UK
